El se define como una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que trabaja diariamente de sol a sol para poder darle a su familia lo mejor. El quiere darle una buena vejez a sus padres y de alguna forma retribuirles todo lo que invirtieron en el.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de alimentos básicos como ser azúcar, yerba, fideos, arroz, y productos enlatados lo cual le servirá para poder abastecer su negocio, pues son los productos que más salida tienen.
Dicho prestamo le dara un mejor margen de ganancia a su negocio, lo que le ayudara a mejorar su nivel de vida y la de sus padres.
texts.en:
Mr. Alfredo is a return client of this institution. He is single and lives with his parents in the city of Luque. He tells us that he has had a store for six years. Thanks to the years he has spent running this business, he now has a very good customer base. He buys his products in the Luque market.
He is a very hard-working person. He works every day from sunrise to sunset in order to give his family the best. He wants to take care of his parents in their old age, in order to pay them back in some way for all they have done for him.
He is requesting this loan for the purchase of basic food goods such as sugar, mate, rice, and canned goods. This will help him to stock his business, since these items are his best sellers.
This loan will give his business a better profit margin, helping him to increase his living standards and those of his parents.

loans.use: to buy sugar, mate, pasta, and canned goods.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.es:
La Srta Melissa tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera aun vive con sus padres. Ella es propietaria de un gimnasio muy concurrido en la ciudad de Caaguazú.
Se dedica a dicha actividad hace un poco mas de un año inicio su negocio gracias a la ayuda de sus padres que la ayudaron a montar dicho negocio. Entre sus anhelos esta la idea de ir ampliando su negocio ya que le genera un muy buen ingreso lo que le permite ayudar con los gastos de la casa y aspira a ser profesional algún día.
Solicito de este crédito para la compra de mas maquinarias para su local ya que cuenta con muy buena demanda y desea brindarles la mejor atención que se merecen a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Miss Melissa is 19, single, and lives with her parents. She owns a very popular gym in Caaguazú city.
Her parents helped her to open her business a little over a year ago. One of her dreams is to expand her business, since it is generating her a very good income. This will allow her to help out with the household costs. She hopes to get a professional degree one day.
She is requesting this loan for the purchase of more machines for her gym, since she has a very good level of customer demand and she wants to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy gym equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Musyoka

texts.en:
Musyoka lives in Changamwe, Kenya. She is married and has two school age children. Musyoka owns a retail shop which has been in operation for two years.

She learned of Milango Financial Services from her friend and joined Milango early this year. Musyoka is applying for a loan of 80,000 KSH to purchase retail stock (e.g. sugar, rice, cooking oil and cereals). Her future ambition is to own a wholesale business.
 
Musyoka will use the extra income to pay school fees, complete the family business and meet other family expenses.

loans.use: To purchase retail stock (e.g. sugar, rice, cooking oil and cereals)

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.es: El señor Lázaro de 32 años es padre y esposo responsable que su mayor prioridad en la vida es tener unida a la familia y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida. Desde hace 3 años inicio con el negocio de transporte urbano del cual es su fuente de ingresos, pero hay una cosa que no le deja ganar mas ya que la unidad en la que trabaja se la renta a una persona por lo que le genera mayor gasto. Por eso el quiere comprar un camión que le ofrecen a un buen precio y que está en perfectas condiciones; por lo quiere aprovechar la oferta, pero no cuenta con el capital necesario para completar. Por tal motivo Lázaro recurre a solicitar de su apoyo para completar el dinero y comprar el camion de esta manera el obtendrá mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Lázaro is 32 years old, and is a responsible father and husband.  His biggest priority in life is to be close to his family and to offer them a better quality of life.  He started his urban transport business 3 years ago and it is his source of income.  However, there is one thing preventing him from earning more, and that is the fact that he rents the vehicle he drives from another individual, which creates additional expenses for Lázaro.  He therefore wants to purchase a truck that has been offered to him for a good price and is in perfect condition.  Lázaro wants to take advantage of the offer, but he doesn’t have the capital that he needs to complete the deal.  That is why Lázaro is asking for your support: so that he can raise the money he needs to purchase the truck and thus earn more income.

loans.use: to purchase a truck to use for his transport business.
